power.daisy_powers.more_crop_drops.name: Bountiful Harvest
power.daisy_powers.more_crop_drops.descr: When harvesting crops, there is a chance that you receive twice the yield.
power.daisy_powers.longer_potions.name: Extended Potions
power.daisy_powers.longer_potions.descri: As a last step in potion brewing, you can double a potion's duration with water from a cauldron.
power.daisy_powers.better_fishing_rod.de: When using a fishing rod you roll the loot table twice and hooking entities with the fishing rod is 3 times more powerful.
When you collect honey, the bees won't try to attack you.
power.daisy_powers.careful_gatherer.name: Careful Gatherer
power.daisy_powers.careful_gatherer.desc: Sweet Berry Bushes don't hurt you at all.
power.daisy_powers.item_collector.name: Item Collector
power.daisy_powers.item_collector.descri: You have a larger item pickup radius.
